task.title: How to make peanut butter and fruit toast
task.shortdesc: This task will explain what you need for and how to make peanut butter and fruit toast.

context.p: This simple breakfast is substatial enough to fill you up, but won't drag you down but taking a million years to make in the morning. Plus, its totally vegan!

You will need:
2 slices whole wheat bread
2 tbsp peanut butter
5 medium strawberries

step.cmd: Toast the bread for three to five minutes, or bake in the oven for 5 minutes at 350 degrees.
Spread peanut butter evenly across slices of toast while they are still warm.
Wash strawberries and cut them width-wise into thin slices. Layer the slices across your toast. Enjoy!
